entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
